string.value: A young man who is about to enter the world. Many perils await him on his way.
Most feeble enemy
Most feeble enemy
Most feeble enemy
Most feeble enemy
Most feeble enemy's cab
Most feeble enemy's cab
Most feeble enemy's cab
Most feeble enemy's cab
Alice’s car cab. Modified scout.
Scout's cab
Scout's cab
Scout's cab
Small gun and high speed. Moderate threat for the trader.
This strange looking vehicle carries enough weapons to present real danger considering raiders rarely attack alone.
Heavy armored vehicle. Beware its missile launcher modification.
Military model.
Modified dozer. Slow but steady.
The coolest truck ever.
Invincible vehicle prototype.
Tremendous carrying capacity of this truck has become proverbial. Quite slow, it often falls a victim to the raiders’ attacks.
This truck offers you the balance of weaponry and carrying capacity. The fastest of all heavy trucks, Ural will drag you out of any danger.
Only careless or desperate traders risk travel by this vehicle. One week gun and almost no armor are partially compensated by its high mobility.
Light truck, liked by rich farmers for the best price-quality ratio. But, it is not safe enough to be liked by professional drivers.
Offence is the best defense. No other truck can carry as much weaponry as Peacekeeper. Its cargo compartment is not very spacious though.
Simple cooling system. Will make reload times for guns shorter.| Guns recharge speed +20%
Simple cooling system. Will make reload times for energy weapons shorter.| Energy weapons recharge speed +20%
Simple cooling system. Will make reload times for explosion weapons shorter. | Explosion weapons recharge speed +20%

Simple gadget that will raise guns accuracy. | Guns accuracy +20%
With this gadget your guns will deal more damage. Simple model. | Guns damage +20%

Increases torque of your truck. | Torque +10%
Increases armor. Feel like a tank. | Armor +10%
Adds some stability to your truck on roads. | Controllability +10%
Larger fuel tank capacity allows you to travel at longer distances. . Advanced model. | Fuel tank capacity +100%
Increases torque of your truck. Advanced model. | Torque +20%
Increases armor. Feel like a tank. Advanced model | Armor +20%
Increases speed and torque of your truck. | Speed +15% | Torque +15%

A sac of potatoes
A pile of rusty metal
A bunch of wood
A barrel of raw oil
Parts of mechanisms
A rare beautiful thing
Precious fuel
Good construction material
Working mechanisms
Ancient books by authors unknown
This minigun sends thousands of bullets toward its target
5,45 mm machinegun is the weakest weapon you can arm your truck with.
5,45 mm paired machinegun is a lot more effective than its one-barreled prototype
7,62 mm machinegun – it will probably save you a difficult journey.
12,7 mm machinegun – a nice weapon to defend from the raiders.
Powerful canon. A good choice for the novice adventurer.
Smallest military laser is more a decoration than the real weapon, but it has its pluses though
20 mm long-range canon will let you attack from far
Shotgun deals heavy damage in close distance.
20 mm rapid-fire canon can shake down an aircraft.
14,5 mm machinegun pierces armor as if it were paper.
20 mm quick-firer is a nice selection for a the two legged beast hunt.
20 mm rapid-fire canon can shake down an aircraft.
37 mm long range canon
Strikes a large area with high speed and damage.
Energy weapon
Heavy shotgun will blast anyone who dares to get too close.
Fires a burst of missiles.
Deals a lot of damage on enemies within certain radius.
Creates a firestorm on the battlefield
For use in extreme situations only.
Ultimate argument on the battlefield. One hit can burn to ashes a middle sized truck.
Spectacular and destructive weapon.
Good to get rid of numerous weak enemies.
It deals a good amount of damage over a short period.
Most powerful rocket launcher.
Lightning hits all enemy cars around.
Damages all cars to the right and to the left of your truck.
Increases your truck’s speed for several seconds.
Certain way to outrun your enemies.
Stops enemy for several seconds.
Wide blast area and small damage.
More dangerous mine.
Maximal damage mine.
The simplest cabin of the Van.
Slightly modified cabin of the Van.
Standard Van cabin heavily modified.
Usual Lorry cabin. Without claims and places for the weapon.
Slightly improved model of a standard cabin.
The advanced model of a cabin with enough place for the weapon and some frightening thorns.
Initial model of a cabin of Ural.
Version of a cabin for trade. The price is lowered due to weaker arms.
Standard cabin prepared for operations. The improved armor. Two slots for the weapon.
The improved version for trade. It is already possible to put a serious gun on it.
This cabin contains the greatest number of upgrades. The armor, arms, torque, speed.
The cheapest and simple cabin for Belaz. It is possible to put a small gun and a couple of gadgets.
The good choice for those who have already got Belaz and have taken a great interest in trade.
Ideal choice for traders.
This cabin is intended for dealers who pay attention not only torque of the motor and to volume of a body, but also safety during transportations.
The cabin combining excellent road performance and good fire power.
Base model of a cabin of the Peacekeeper. Even the simplest cabin possesses uncommon running and fighting qualities.
Modification of base model. Critical parameters are improved.
On this version of a cabin it is possible to establish two big guns.
More speed, armor, power.
Top model of a cabin for the Peacekeeper. On this miracle of mechanics it is possible to put a huge gun, and enemies need to wait only for death or to seek safety in flight.
The smallest and the simplest body for the Van.
There is more place for cargo than in base model. There is space for special weapon, too.
The body possesses carrying capacity which will suffice the beginning trader, and the armor, for a beginner daredevil.
The big body and place for the weapon - it is quite good for the simplest version.
Slightly improved base body It carries more armor and has a slot for the special weapon.
Slightly improved base body. It has better armor and a place for the special weapon.
Good for trade, armored enough.
It is capacious enough for trade, there is enough hard for fight.
This body offers smaller fire power, but thicker armor.

This model of a body is intended for operations rather than trade. And the opportunity to establish a giant gun makes this body the best choice for fans of shooting who do not have money for the most advanced model yet.
It is a top model among bodies for Ural. Fighting is its direct purpose. It has good fire power and impenetrable armor.
Though this body looks like a can, it possesses good load-carrying capacity.
The body Is intended for those who are engaged in trade. Purchase of this body - a first step for achievement of dream of any trucker.
Unsurpassed cargo hold of a body, it is well enough adapted for fight with marauders.
It is more adapted for fight, than for trade. A huge gun and the impenetrable armor.
Practically impenetrable body for trade and fight. Will sustain claims of any gangsters.
Standard body of the Peacekeeper. Lost of armor. Good cargo hold. A place for a good gun.
It is even more armor. As there is a place under a huge gun and the special weapon.
You can put such an arsenal of the weapon on this body that the majority of enemies will not want to deal with you.
Almost perfect for conducting fights one against army.
Perfection of military technologies. Everything any militarist could dream of.
Cross-country Scout. It is intended for travel in the most freakish places.
Cross-country Scout cabin.
Hunter’s cabin.
Hunter’s improved cabin.
Fighter’s cabin.
Fighter’s improved cabin.
Cruiser’s cabin.
Cruiser’s improved cabin.
Cruiser’s cabin.
Cruiser’s improved cabin.
It was hard to obtain. I hope the Oracle's disciples will be satisfied with it.
I am note sure about this thing, but the Oracle gave no precise description of the artifacts he need. This should do the trick.
I hope the Oracle will find this device useful. I don't want to come back to the factory.
According to druids, this stone will call forth the Earth's anger. I'd better be far away when it happens.
This should help the Oracle to regain his memories.
This should help the Oracle to regain his memories.
This should help the Oracle to regain his memories.

If you are reading this letter, it means I couldn’t come back. Sad but true. I know Peter well and have no worriers about your education. My heart hurts at the thought of you becoming a man, while I am far away. It is a real torment. But you must know that I had no other choice, but to leave. Too much is at stake. I have to right the wrong. Only by achieving my goal can I prove myself worthy of being called father... and husband. I am sorry, son. Forgive me, if you can.
This package must be delivered to Sergo, a friend of my father.
A box of medicine, I found at the ruins of a hospital.
An explosive charge powerful enough to blast reinforced concrete walls
The barrel that was given to me at the Monastery. I do not want to remember what I had to do in order to get it.
It is a necessary component for the device that will allow me to cross the desert.
I must deliver this terrible thing to the Monastery
I must deliver this terrible thing to the Monastery
A piece of rusty machinery.
Ancient masterpiece. The connoisseurs would pay greatly for it.
A cargo of narcotics that was stolen from the local criminals.
A canister of raw oil. I must deliver it as prove that my work is complete.
The disk that used to belong to Ivan Go. It probably contains information, concerning his disappearance.
The second disk, containing the password to access Ivan Go’s diary.
This sophisticated device is somehow connected with the sea travels.
The key that opens the tunnel to the Oracles land.
Smoke screen will not allow enemies to catch you too fast.
Anti-missile system will protect you from enemy missiles by confusing their sensors
